item.title: Leaves, 2nd December
item.description:
My house is below a council tree and my drive is covered in leaves. I have swept up as much as I can and put to the side of the road so the leaf machine can hopefully collect it. Im not sure if there is a planned leaf collection but I have made quite a large pile and hope it can be collected soon before it blows back all over my gravel drive which is hard to clear. Thank you for any assistance you can give.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairfield Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping blocking footpath for pedestrians, 2nd December
item.description:
We noticed a significant amount of furniture and household rubbish was dumped next to our driveway (46 Halesworth Rd) at about 2:30pm on the 01.12.25. This is now blocking people using the footpath, especially those with prams and mobility issues. A neighbour across the road from us has confirmed the above through their door bell camera which had captured the incident. We are looking to get the rubbish removed as soon as possible due to it being a pedestrian hazard. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Halesworth Road, Ladywell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked Rainwater Gulley, 2nd December
item.description:
Raineater gulley at N20 9PF A1000 Northbound carriageway (opposite Buckingham Avenue) Directly adjacent to bus stop (Northound) Rainwater Gulley blocked Large volume of water from ,a mains water leak a short distance away is not going down the rainwater gulley, which appears to be blocked
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1441, High Road, Whetstone, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street sweeping at Maury Road., 2nd December
item.description:
Maury Road N16 in need of street sweeping, there are loads of leaves on the kerb. It has been a while since the street was cleaned. The last sweeper has left sacks full of leaves on the road, please remove.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Maury Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Slippery walkway due to amalgation of wet leaves, 2nd December
item.description:
The street hasn't been cleaned since the trees lost their last leaves. They’ve accumulated along the side of the road because of the recent wind, and they’re now stuck and slippery.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Archangel Street, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous paving outside Bethel Mini Mart and Sainsbury's Abbey Wood, 2nd December
item.description:
A huge number of the grey paving stones in front of Bethel Mini Mart have been dislodged by cars being driven on the paving stones. The stones are so uneven (and at least one is missing), they are a danger to pedestrians.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tilston Bright Square, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet
